name: Vaginal Davis
description: '''Vaginal Davis''' (born in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]]) is an American performer, painter, independent curator, composer, film-maker and writer. Born [[intersex]] and raised in [[South Los Angeles|South Central, Los Angeles]], Davis gained notoriety in [[New York City|New York]] during the 1980s, where she inspired the [[Bushwick, Brooklyn|Bushwick]] neighborhood of [[Brooklyn]]'s prevalent drag scene as a [[genderqueer]] artist. She currently resides in [[Berlin|Berlin, Germany]].
